sentences.en: He discharged himself from hospital against the advice of doctors.
sentences.cn: 他不顾医生的劝告自行出院了。

sentences.en: He hanged himself two hours after arriving at a mental hospital.
sentences.cn: 在到精神病医院两小时后他就上吊自杀了。

sentences.en: He is still fighting for his life in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他仍在医院与死神搏斗。

sentences.en: Her childhood was overshadowed by her mother's incarceration in a psychiatric hospital.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲被关在精神病院，这给她的童年蒙上了阴影。

sentences.en: I should point out that these estimates cover just the hospital expenditures.
sentences.cn: 我应该指出，这些估算仅包括医院的费用。

sentences.en: She attended a cancer support group at her local hospital.
sentences.cn: 她参加了当地医院的癌症互助组。

sentences.en: She was admitted to hospital with a soaring temperature.
sentences.cn: 她因发高烧被送进医院。

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital, apparently amnesiac and shocked.
sentences.cn: 她被送往医院，好像是受了惊吓出现了失忆。

sentences.en: The doctors gave numerous examples of patients being expelled from hospital.
sentences.cn: 医生们列举了大量病人被逐出医院的实例。

sentences.en: The hospital has pioneered the use of birthing pools.
sentences.cn: 这家医院率先使用了分娩池。

sentences.en: The results show the level of frustration among hospital doctors.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了医院医生的不满程度。

sentences.en: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们正在建一家新医院。

sentences.en: They feel scared and powerless in conveyor-belt hospital wards.
sentences.cn: 在千篇一律的病房里，他们感到恐惧而又无能为力。

sentences.en: They were taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 他们因吸入大量烟尘被送往医院。

sentences.en: Today the best tests are performed in the hospital .see chap. 17..
sentences.cn: 现在，本医院可提供最好的化验（见第17章）。

sentences.en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
